review_data.title: Great food for a food court.
review_data.content: I visit Zurich airport quite often with work and have eaten at all of the food places in this food court. The quality, flavours and service is the best hands down. The top quality Thai curry has to be a favourite. Not watery or without...More

review_data.title: Tasty Asian cuisine !
review_data.content: We had a quick dinner here before catching a late flight out of Zurich airport. The food was very tasty and authentic Asian cuisine. Good value for money. It was prepared to order and served hot and fast !
